Package com.isotrol.impe3.core.modules

Interface Summary
ModuleStarter<T extends Module> Fluent interface to start a module.
StartedModule<T extends Module> Interface representing a running module.
 

Class Summary
ComponentProvision Provision relationship.
ConnectorProvision Provision relationship.
Dependency Dependency relationship.
DependencyFactoryBean Spring factory bean to supply a dependency.
ModuleDefinition<T extends Module> Object that encapsulates the definition of a module.
Modules Utility methods and values related to modules.
Provision Provision relationship.
Relationship Base class for relationships between modules.
 

Enum Summary
ModuleType Enumeration of module types.
 

Exception Summary
ActionNotFoundException The provided action bean is not found.
BeanModuleException Base exception for module loading errors related to some bean.
BeanTypeModuleException Base exception for module loading errors related to some bean and its type.
DefinitionModuleException Error during bean definition loading and parsing.
DuplicateDependsException A duplicate dependency has been requested.
DuplicateModuleConfigurationException More than one configuration has been requested.
EmptyModuleException The interface is empty.
EmptyPathException An empty context path has been provided.
ForbiddenDependsException A forbidden dependency has been requested.
ForbiddenProvisionException The exported bean is of a forbidden type.
InvalidComponentException Invalid component.
InvalidDependsException An invalid signature is provided for a dependency method.
InvalidMethodsException The interface has invalid methods.
InvalidProvidesException An invalid signature is provided for a provision method.
InvalidProvisionTypeException The exported bean is not of the correct type.
InvalidScopeException Invalid scope for an exported bean.
ModuleConfigurationException Invalid module configuration.
ModuleException Base exception for module loading errors.
NonInterfaceDependsException A dependency of a non-interface type has been requested.
NonInterfaceModuleException The module is not an interface.
NonInterfaceProvidesException The module is not an interface.
NonLocalPathException A path to a different package has been provided.
NoProvisionsException The module does not export anything.
ProvidesBothException The module exports both connectors and components/actions.
ProvisionNotFoundException The provided bean is not found.
